name: Tumblr Pale Forest Dashboard
description: A style that changes the background of your Tumblr dashboard to a pretty and calming pale forest :) ~ my tumblr: flecked.tumblr.com

user.name: flecked
user.about: Hello! I'm new to creating styles, but I hope I can get better. I aim to create styles that anyone can use :) All will be for Tumblr.
